item.title: 844. Backspace String Compare
item.description: # O(n + m) time || O(1) space def backspace_compare_two_pointers(self, s: str, t: str) -> bool: def trim(to_trim): skip = 0 for c in reversed(to_trim): if c == '#': skip += 1 elif skip: skip -= 1 else: yield c return all(a == b for a, b in itertools.zip_longest(trim(s), trim(t))) # O(n + m) time || O(n + m) space def backspace_compare_stack(self, s: str, t: str) -> bool: def trim(to_trim): stack = [] for c in to_trim: if c !
